name: atomic-read-file-request
description: Request to read data from a file object atomically, using either stream or record access methods.

fields.name: file-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier of the file to read from.

fields.name: access-method

options.name: stream-access

fields.name: file-start-position
fields.description: The starting byte position in the file.

fields.name: requested-octet-count
fields.description: The number of bytes to read.

options.description: Read data from the file as a stream of bytes.

options.name: record-access

fields.name: file-start-record
fields.description: The starting record number in the file.

fields.name: requested-record-count
fields.description: The number of records to read.

options.description: Read data from the file as a series of records.

fields.description: The access method specifying what data to read.
